程序包的使用
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test

  • 使用org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test  
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test中的类 
    类和说明
    MetricsAssertHelper
    Interface of a class to make assertions about metrics values.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test中的类 
    类和说明
    MetricsAssertHelper
    Interface of a class to make assertions about metrics values.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test中的类 
    类和说明
    MetricsAssertHelper
    Interface of a class to make assertions about metrics values.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test中的类 
    类和说明
    MetricsAssertHelper
    Interface of a class to make assertions about metrics values.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test中的类 
    类和说明
    IntegrationTestBigLinkedList
    This is an integration test borrowed from goraci, written by Keith Turner, which is in turn inspired by the Accumulo test called continous ingest (ci).
    IntegrationTestLoadAndVerify
    A large test which loads a lot of data that has internal references, and verifies the data.
    IntegrationTestLoadAndVerify.LoadMapper 
    IntegrationTestReplication.ClusterID
    Wrapper around an HBase ClusterID allowing us to get admin connections and configurations for it
    IntegrationTestTimeBoundedRequestsWithRegionReplicas
    An IntegrationTest for doing reads with a timeout, to a read-only table with region replicas.
    MetricsAssertHelper
    Interface of a class to make assertions about metrics values.
